name: pumpkin patch
notes:
with two stands held together giving you a marled look throughout, you can mix the colors and create your own unique pumpkin patch. pattern uses one fall festival bundle with 2 strands held together throughout.

experience level: advanced beginner

materials

* woolstok (worsted) bundle (100% fine highland wool, 21 mini hanks: 5g/12 yd each): 1 bundle (fall festival)
* size 8 (5mm) double point needles, or size needed to
obtain gauge
* stitch marker
* stuffing
* tapestry needle

finished measurements

* circumference: 11½ (13½)" after stuffing
* height: 2½" after cinching

colors shown

* fall festival bundle
